detail_desc: Hat in paper straw with a grosgrain band. Width of brim 8.5 cm.
Tunic in an airy weave with a V-neck, yoke with a pleat at the back, detachable tie belt at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Short dress in an airy cotton weave with a deep V-neck, short sleeves, gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Hairbands in an airy weave. Can be worn around the head or a ponytail.
Set with two short-sleeved tops and two pairs of trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey. Tops with lapped shoulders. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Short dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit with a V-neck, dropped shoulders, straight hem with slits in the sides and ribbing around the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Socks in a soft, fine knit containing some merino wool with elasticated tops.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder.
Thong body in stretch cotton jersey with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, low-cut back, lined gusset and string back.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey.
5-pocket jeans in superstretch washed denim with a regular waist and super-skinny legs.
Trousers in soft silk with a high, elasticated waist, pockets in the side seams and straight, wide legs.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a fold-down shaft and soft terry inside. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Cropped top in a soft, fine knit containing some wool. Wide shoulder straps reinforced with grosgrain, and a wide, ribbed hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed jersey with a square neckline at the front, a deep neckline at the back and short sleeves.
Short-sleeved tops in cotton jersey.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Short dress in a Tencel™ lyocell and linen weave that is voluminous at the top and has a neat silhouette at the bottom. V-neck and a yoke with a short, loose edge front and back. Wide, gathered, balloon sleeves with wide, close-fitting, buttoned cuffs. Pleats on the bodice and a drawstring at the waist that finishes at the sides and allows the size of the waist to be adjusted. Straight, close-fitting skirt with pockets in the side seams and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a square neckline, lined front and wide elastic hem. Medium support.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in stretch cotton jersey with a collar and button placket. Slim fit.
Short skater skirt in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist and visible zip at the back. Unlined.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated, lace-trimmed tops.

Long parka in woven fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Side pockets with a press-stud, long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the waist and hem. Lined.
Small bag in sturdy, grained imitation leather with an adjustable shoulder strap and flap with a magnetic fastener and decorative metal ring. Lined. Size 6x14x19 cm.
T-shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and gently rounded hem. Raw, roll edges around the neckline and sleeves.
Hat in a rib-knit mohair blend.
Short, sleeveless dress in glittery jersey with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps. Unlined.
Jacket in stretch, lightweight cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a press-stud and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Skirt in stretch jersey made from a viscose blend containing glittery threads. Elasticated waist.

Waterproof hi-tops in mesh and imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue. Hook and loop tab at the top, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Set with a dress and matching bolero. Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Narrow cut at the top with short shoulder straps, a gathered seam at the hips and a flared skirt that is slightly longer at the back. Unlined. Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and a faceted, heart-shaped button at the top.
Fleece-lined jacket in a patterned weave with a stand-up collar, detachable hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Elastication around the hood, cuffs and hem.

Set with a sleeveless romper suit and a long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton jersey. Patterned romper suit with a kangaroo pocket, press-studs on the shoulders and at the crotch, and ribbed hems. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder.
Wide blouse in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a button and yoke with decorative gathers at the top. Long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs.

department_name: Sneakers small girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Imitation leather hi-tops with elasticated lacing at the front, an adjustable hook and loop tab at the top and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Soft, non-wired lace bra with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable double shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Tube scarf in a soft knit with a wrapover front. Length approx. 34 cm, circumference approx. 55 cm.
Thong briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend. Low waist with wide elastication, a lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Top in light, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline,cuffs and hem.
Short skirt in imitation leather with an embroidered motif on the front, visible zip at the back and raw-edge hem. Lined.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot. Fabric linings and insoles.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Knee-length skirt in airy chiffon with a high waist, box pleats at the top, a detachable tie belt, concealed zip at the back and diagonal side pockets. Lined.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif, a double-layered drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short jersey top with inset mesh sections at the top and long sleeves.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Soft, non-wired bra in mesh with glittery threads. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, side support and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Short-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey with a round neckline.
Baby Exclusive. Scarf in an airy cotton weave. Size 40x40 cm.
Hooded jacket with a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Wide, ankle-length trousers in stretch cotton twill with a high, adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, patch front pockets and straight legs.
High-waisted, slim-fit trousers in a stretch weave with a brushed finish. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, back pockets and legs with narrow hems.
Large make-up bag in imitation patent leather with a zip. Flap and base in transparent plastic. Partly lined. Height 6 cm. Depth 18.5 cm. Width 23 cm.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique. Key pocket in the waistband.
Loose-fitting shirt in cotton poplin with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Dropped shoulders, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim in a looser fit with tapered legs. Wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Leggings in patterned sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist. Pile lining.
Blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, ties at the top, a yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves and cuffs with covered buttons.

Jacket in cotton twill with a high stand-up collar with press-studs and a drawstring hood. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, flap front pockets with a press-stud and raglan sleeves with cuffs with a press-stud. Rounded hem with zipped slits in the sides. Unlined.
Shorts in soft cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, side pockets, a welt back pocket with a button and a zip fly with a button.
Cropped top in soft jersey with raw, rolled edges.
Trousers in an airy cotton weave with a frill trim at the top, decorative tie detail at the front and elastication at the back of the waist. Side pockets, and legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long, sleeveless dress in chiffon crêpe with a concealed zip at the back and hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist with beaded and sequined embroidery at the front. Lined.
Bucket hat in woven fabric. Width of brim approx. 6 cm.

Set with a T-shirt and cycling shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey. Straight-cut T-shirt with an embroidered motif at the top and a ribbed trim around the neckline. Cycling shorts with an elasticated waist.
Satin blouse with a deep V-neck, long, voluminous sleeves and beaded cuffs with a concealed press-stud fastening. Lined front.
Sleeveless V-neck body in soft jersey with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
T-shirt in soft jersey.
Knee-length jacket in a wool blend containing some silk with tuxedo-style lapels in satin and a concealed press-stud fastening at the front. Long sleeves with a pleat at the cuffs. Lined.
Fancy dress costume in soft velour. Hood with embroidered details and appliqués, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Fully lined shaping swimsuit that has a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and bum. Frill-trimmed wrapover top, lightly padded cups, decorative gathers in the sides, and adjustable shoulder straps.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft cotton. Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with press-studs on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers in lightweight jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and elasticated hems.
V-neck top in slub jersey with a lace yoke, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
